author: hsiaowei
content:
**staking-deposit-cli Updates**
- I addressed the JSON schema suggestions. (Thank you all for the feedback ğŸ™) See https://github.com/ethereum/staking-deposit-cli/issues/312
- The feature branch location: https://github.com/ethereum/staking-deposit-cli/tree/bls-to-execution-change
    - Please see the PR description about the usage: https://github.com/ethereum/staking-deposit-cli/pull/313
    -  NOTE: we can use the `--devnet_chain_setting` argument to set custom devnet info.
